info.description: The Azure management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure Dedicated HSM RP.
info.title: Azure Dedicated HSM Resource Provider

get.description: The List operation gets information about the dedicated HSMs associated with the subscription.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.
parameters.name: $top

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: Get information about all dedicated HSMs in the specified subscription.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of dedicated hsms.

id.description: The Azure Resource Manager resource ID for the dedicated HSM.

location.description: The supported Azure location where the dedicated HSM should be created.

name.description: The name of the dedicated HSM.

type.description: The resource type of the dedicated HSM.

networkProfile.description: Specifies the network interfaces of the dedicated hsm.

networkInterfaces.description: Specifies the list of resource Ids for the network interfaces associated with the dedicated HSM.

id.description: The ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

privateIpAddress.description: Private Ip address of the interface

subnet.description: Specifies the identifier of the subnet.

id.description: The ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

values.description: The dedicated HSM has been full provisioned.
The dedicated HSM is currently being provisioned.
A device is currently being allocated for the dedicated HSM resource.
The dedicated HSM is being connected to the virtual network.
Provisioning of the dedicated HSM has failed.
Validating the subscription has sufficient quota to allocate a dedicated HSM device.
The dedicated HSM is currently being deleted.

stampId.description: This field will be used when RP does not support Availability zones.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The List operation gets information about the dedicated hsms associated with the subscription and within the specified resource group.

parameters.description: The name of the Resource Group to which the dedicated HSM belongs.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.
parameters.name: $top

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: Get information about all dedicated HSMs in the specified resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of dedicated hsms.

id.description: The Azure Resource Manager resource ID for the dedicated HSM.

location.description: The supported Azure location where the dedicated HSM should be created.

name.description: The name of the dedicated HSM.

type.description: The resource type of the dedicated HSM.

networkProfile.description: Specifies the network interfaces of the dedicated hsm.

networkInterfaces.description: Specifies the list of resource Ids for the network interfaces associated with the dedicated HSM.

id.description: The ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

privateIpAddress.description: Private Ip address of the interface

subnet.description: Specifies the identifier of the subnet.

id.description: The ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

values.description: The dedicated HSM has been full provisioned.
The dedicated HSM is currently being provisioned.
A device is currently being allocated for the dedicated HSM resource.
The dedicated HSM is being connected to the virtual network.
Provisioning of the dedicated HSM has failed.
Validating the subscription has sufficient quota to allocate a dedicated HSM device.
The dedicated HSM is currently being deleted.

stampId.description: This field will be used when RP does not support Availability zones.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Azure Dedicated HSM.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the dedicated HSM to delete
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.
